name: The Mech is on Fire
description:
The Mech is on Fire!!!

...and its your job to save it while everyone runs around panicking.

  • Fly around the ship and extinguish fires.
  • Watch out for battery cells, if fire gets too close they shut down.
  • Keep all 3 battery cells active to fire THE BIG LASER!!!
Controls:
  • Mouse movement - Rotate the player
  • Left mouse button - Move / Use fire extinguisher
  • Right mouse button - Attach the player to wall / Repair the battery / Activate the laser
  • Scroll - Zoom in / Zoom out
